DOC.brief_summary: The investigators will measure the pharmacokinetics of doripenem in skeletal muscle, subcutaneous adipose tissue, bronchoalveolar lavage and plasma of intubated intensive care patients.
DOC.brief_title: Target Site Pharmacokinetics of Doripenem at Steady State in Intubated Intensive Care Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Methods: microdialysis, blood sampling, bronchoalveolar lavage
DOC.criteria: endotracheal intubation; pneumonia or complicated abdominal infection or complicated urinary tract infection allergy to doripenem, hemodialysis
